mapper.select: select gw.id, gwmc , gwsl - count(gwid) as gwsl from XT_SSGW gw left join XT_SSJJY jjy on jjy.gwid = gw.id and jjy.zt = '1' where gw.ssid = #{ssid} group by gwid

SELECT count(1) from XT_SSGW,XT_SSGL where XT_SSGW.ssid = #{ssid} and XT_SSGL.id=XT_SSGW.ssid
and gwmc like '%${gwmc}%'

select XT_SSGW.* from XT_SSGW,XT_SSGL where XT_SSGW.ssid = #{ssid} and XT_SSGL.id=XT_SSGW.ssid
and gwmc like '%${gwmc}%'
order by id desc
limit ${startPage}, ${page}
